p: According to the 7 th edition of the diagnostic criteria [ 25], patients severely or critically ill with COVID-19 should receive comprehensive antiviral treatment, including lopinavir/ritonavir, arbidol, or Shufeng Jiedu Capsule. Meanwhile, they also need additional treatments, according to their symptoms, including respiratory support (oxygen therapy, high-flow nasal cannulas, or noninvasive ventilation, invasive mechanical ventilation, or extracorporeal membrane oxygenation- (ECMO-) based therapy), circulatory support, or continuous renal replacement therapy.
